subject: Pedal pin out
description_text:
Hello, I was wondering if you guys could send me the wiring pin out on the RJ12 connector for the pedals? I need to know which wires are which (power, ground, signal) and where they go in the connector if possible.
Thank you,Jesse

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi jesse sturgill,  Hello, may I have your order number? For security and privacy reasons, we’re unable to provide this information directly.
